title: Gabriel Iglesias
description:
Kevin is joined by comedian and actor Gabriel Iglesias on this episode. They talk about how he came up with his nickname Fluffy, his promotional strategy when starting out in comedy, testing positive for COVID while in Texas, and how he went from selling homemade CD’s at his shows to a merchandise empire.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Gabriel Iglesias)
